subdisciplines.name: Environmental Aesthetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of aesthetic appreciation of natural environments and how it intersects with environmental ethics and concerns.

subdisciplines.name: Feminist Aesthetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how gender and sexuality influence perception and creation of art and aesthetics.

subdisciplines.name: Literary Aesthetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the aesthetic properties of literature, such as style, narrative, and the relationship between form and content.

subdisciplines.name: Visual Aesthetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the aesthetic properties of visual art, such as painting, sculpture, and photography.
